articles.author: Rebekah Riess
articles.title: Judge rules Colorado student cannot wear a sash with Mexican and American flags during graduation - CNN
articles.description: A federal judge has ruled for a Colorado school district after a student sued to wear a sash reflecting the Mexican and American flags at graduation Saturday.
articles.content:
A federal judge has ruled for a Colorado school district after a student sued to wear a sash reflecting the Mexican and American flags at graduation Saturday.
